name: Talk Morrissey 2
_source: speak;Morrissey;Were the chambers not to your liking?
speak;Simon;No, the rooms were more than fine.
speak;Simon;I just had some trouble sleeping.
speak;Morrissey;Please, you simply must take your mind off of this.
speak;Morrissey;Why don't you join my daughter Anuki in a skirmish against my guard captain?
s;Morrissey;I would value the chance to see your tactics and swordsmanship in practice.
s;Morrissey;I do believe our houses would be stronger together than apart.
s;Morrissey;And a union between yourself and Anuki would certainly be one way to forge a strong alliance.
s;Morrissey;But I only ask that you think on this.
s;Simon;Uh, of course. {w}I'll give it some thought.
speak;Morrissey;The training grounds are on the west side of the main hall.
s;Morrissey;We'll talk more after you clear your head.
